abilitiesRevealed.name: Doppelman Deception
abilitiesRevealed.description: Moria uses his shadow clone (Doppelman) to deceive Luffy, making him chase the shadow while the real Moria escapes.

keyMoments.description: Moria uses Doppelman to trick Luffy into chasing his shadow instead of pursuing him directly.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the tactical applications of Moria's Devil Fruit beyond simple shadow stealing
